name: Fried Chicken Unlimited
description: Crispy and juicy fried chicken, marinated in our secret blend of 11 herbs and spices. Served hot and fresh with your choice of dipping sauce. A classic favorite that never disappoints!

name: Burger King Whopper
description: A flame-grilled beef patty topped with fresh lettuce, tomatoes, pickles, onions, ketchup, and mayonnaise on a toasted sesame seed bun. The king of all burgers!

name: White Castle Pizzas
description: Authentic Italian-style pizza with a thin crispy crust, topped with premium mozzarella cheese, fresh basil, and our signature tomato sauce. Baked to perfection in our stone oven.

name: Bell Burrito Supreme
description: A hearty burrito filled with seasoned beef, refried beans, Spanish rice, sour cream, lettuce, tomatoes, and shredded cheese, all wrapped in a warm flour tortilla.

name: Kung Pao Chicken BBQ
description: Tender chicken pieces tossed in a sweet and spicy Kung Pao sauce with roasted peanuts, bell peppers, and dried red chilies. A perfect blend of Chinese flavors!

name: Wendy's Chicken Sandwich
description: Premium chicken breast, lightly breaded and fried until golden brown. Served with crispy lettuce, tomato, and our special mayo on a soft brioche bun.

name: Pepperoni Paradise Pizza
description: Loaded with spicy pepperoni slices, extra cheese, and a zesty tomato sauce. Every bite is a flavor explosion!

name: Classic Lemonade
description: Freshly squeezed lemonade made with real lemons, pure cane sugar, and a hint of mint. Perfectly refreshing on a hot day!

name: Spicy Buffalo Wings
description: Crispy chicken wings coated in our signature buffalo sauce with a kick of heat. Served with blue cheese dressing and celery sticks for the perfect balance.

name: Deluxe Cheeseburger
description: Double beef patties with melted cheddar cheese, crispy bacon, caramelized onions, fresh lettuce, and our special house sauce on a toasted pretzel bun.

name: Vegetarian Supreme Pizza
description: A garden-fresh delight loaded with bell peppers, mushrooms, red onions, black olives, tomatoes, and fresh spinach on our signature crust with marinara sauce.

name: BBQ Bacon Burger
description: Juicy beef patty smothered in tangy BBQ sauce, topped with crispy bacon strips, fried onion rings, pepper jack cheese, and coleslaw on a buttered brioche bun.

name: Teriyaki Chicken Bowl
description: Grilled chicken breast glazed with sweet teriyaki sauce, served over steamed jasmine rice with stir-fried vegetables and sesame seeds. A healthy and delicious option!

name: Strawberry Milkshake
description: Creamy and smooth milkshake made with fresh strawberries, premium vanilla ice cream, and whole milk. Topped with whipped cream and a fresh strawberry.

name: Meat Lovers Pizza
description: The ultimate carnivore's dream! Topped with pepperoni, Italian sausage, bacon, ham, and ground beef on a thick crust with extra mozzarella and parmesan cheese.

name: Iced Coffee Delight
description: Smooth cold brew coffee served over ice with a splash of cream and your choice of flavor syrup. Perfect pick-me-up for any time of day!

name: Nashville Hot Chicken
description: Crispy fried chicken breast with Nashville-style hot sauce, pickles, and coleslaw on a toasted bun. Warning: This one packs serious heat!

name: Tropical Smoothie
description: A refreshing blend of mango, pineapple, banana, and coconut milk. Packed with vitamins and perfect for a healthy boost!
